languages.text: {n}Тембр Паскаля становится хрупким, звенящим.{/n} "Мы использовали совершенные стимулы. Любопытство, тревога... стыд. Каждая наша часть была заложницей легенды о совершенном ею предательстве, ибо страдание сподвигало нас к поиску".

{n}A ringing brittleness enters Pasqal's voice:{/n} "We were motivated by the perfect stimuli. Curiosity, anxiety... shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."
languages.original_text: {n}Тембр Паскаля становится хрупким, звенящим.{/n} "Мы использовали совершенные стимулы. Любопытство, тревога... стыд. Каждая наша часть была заложницей легенды о совершенном ею предательстве, ибо страдание сподвигало нас к поиску".

traits.locale_text: {n}Now there's a ringing brittleness in Pasqal's voice.{/n} "We motivated ourselves with perfect stimuli. Curiosity. Anxiety... Shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声の響きが弱々しいものになる。{/n}「自分たちは完成された刺激に動かされていました。好奇心、不安…恥。自分たちはそれぞれ、かつて犯した背信の名を頼みにしていたのです。苦痛によって探究と努力の道に引きずり込まれていたというわけです」
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing brittleness enters Pasqal's voice:{/n} "We were motivated by the perfect stimuli. Curiosity, anxiety... shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声の響きが弱々しいものになる。{/n}「自分たちは完成された刺激に動かされていました。好奇心、不安…恥。自分たちはそれぞれ、かつて犯した背信の名を頼みにしていたのです。苦痛によって探究と努力の道に引きずり込まれていたというわけです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡此刻的声音变得清脆而响亮。{/n}“我们被追求完美的刺激因素所驱动。好奇、焦虑……还有耻辱，我们的每个部分，都被它犯下的背叛之罪所绑架。苦难驱使着我们去探索，去努力。”
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing brittleness enters Pasqal's voice:{/n} "We were motivated by the perfect stimuli. Curiosity, anxiety... shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡此刻的声音变得清脆而响亮。{/n}“我们被追求完美的刺激因素所驱动。好奇、焦虑……还有耻辱，我们的每个部分，都被它犯下的背叛之罪所绑架。苦难驱使着我们去探索，去努力。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous décelez une légère fragilité dans la voix de Pasqal.{/n} « Nous avons été motivés par un stimulus parfait. La curiosité, l'anxiété... la honte. Chacun d'entre nous était prisonnier de la légende de sa propre trahison, mais c'est cette même souffrance qui nous a poussés à chercher et à ne pas abandonner. »
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing brittleness enters Pasqal's voice:{/n} "We were motivated by the perfect stimuli. Curiosity, anxiety... shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous décelez désormais une légère fragilité dans la voix de Pasqal.{/n} « Nous avons été motivés par un stimulus parfait. La curiosité, l'anxiété... la honte. Chacun d'entre nous était prisonnier de la légende de sa propre trahison, mais c'est cette même souffrance qui nous a poussés à chercher et à ne pas abandonner. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Pasqal se vuelve palpablemente frágil.{/n} «Nos motivaron los mejores estímulos: la curiosidad, la ansiedad... la vergüenza. Todos teníamos una razón para sentirnos culpables de una supuesta traición, y el sufrimiento nos impulsó a buscar respuestas y esforzarnos».
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing brittleness enters Pasqal's voice:{/n} "We were motivated by the perfect stimuli. Curiosity, anxiety... shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ahora la voz de Pasqal se siente palpablemente frágil.{/n} «Nos motivaron los mejores estímulos: la curiosidad, la ansiedad... la vergüenza. Todos teníamos una razón para sentíamos culpables de una supuesta traición, y el sufrimiento nos impulsó a buscar respuestas y esforzarnos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nun liegt in Pasqals Stimme eine dröhnende Brüchigkeit.{/n} "Wir wurden von perfekten Stimuli motiviert. Neugier, Unruhe ... Scham. Jeder Teil von uns wurde von der Legende eines Verrats Geisel gehalten, den er begangen hatte. Denn das Leid trieb uns an, zu suchen und zu streben."
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing brittleness enters Pasqal's voice:{/n} "We were motivated by the perfect stimuli. Curiosity, anxiety... shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."

Jeder Teil von uns wurde von der Legende eines Verrats Geisel gehalten, den er begangen hatte. Denn das Leid trieb uns an, zu suchen und zu streben."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesine belirgin bir kırılganlık hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Kusursuz uyarıcılar tarafından harekete geçirildik. Merak, kaygı... Utanç. Her birimiz, kendi ihanetimizin efsanesinde tutsaktık. Acımız ise araştırıp arzulamamıza önayak oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing brittleness enters Pasqal's voice:{/n} "We were motivated by the perfect stimuli. Curiosity, anxiety... shame. Each part of us was hostage to the legend of a betrayal it had committed, for suffering drove us to search and strive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesine belirgin bir kırılganlık hâkim oluyor:{/n} "Kusursuz uyarıcılar tarafından harekete geçirildik. Merak, kaygı... Utanç. Her bir parçamız, gerçekleştirdiği bir ihanete dair anlatılan efsanelerin tutsağıydı çünkü bu acı, araştırmamıza ve arzulamamıza önayak oldu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
